author: Special Correspondent
text:
In another step to appeal to the intellect and aesthetics of the discerning global traveller, Kerala Tourism is taking to Kindle to provide a peep into its jaw-dropping destinations.

Five richly illustrated books with fascinating descriptions on God’s Own Country’s major tourism destinations are now available for the e-readers on Kindle.

The books – Kerala and the Spice Routes , Silent Valley National Park , Periyar Tiger Reserve , Eravikulam National Park and Parambikulam Tiger Reserve – contain pictures taken by top professionals in nature and wildlife photography.

Kerala and the Spice Routes narrates the rich multi-culturalism of the State more than two-millennia ago by taking the readers through the Malabar Coast that was the starting point for Kerala’s spice trade with the rest of the world. It talks about the history of races that touched the State’s shores, the landing of traders and the synergies that worked to create a rich social fabric that has been lauded worldwide.
title: Kindling love for Kerala in tourists
